Hey everyone,
         I bought this game yeaaaars ago, and just recently 
remembered about it and the FS website. So I went there, and so this 
mailing list. I was just curious, did they move websites? Because 
that website hasn't been updated in forever. And is Beyond Freedom 
still coming out? I sent an e-mail to the addy the website gives 
about 6 months ago asking, but no reply. Thanks for your time.

                             -Wes
